titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to obligate and expend funds made available for price support programs of agricultural commodities for the purpose of drought assistance programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 6/8/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to obligate unused price support funds for drought assistance.
